title: Twice will perform at Tokyo Dome
text: K-pop girl group Twice will perform at the Tokyo Dome stadium next year on a new Tokyo leg of its ongoing world tour, the band’s management agency said Monday.The girl group is currently in the middle of its globe-trotting concert tour, with the Japanese leg having kicked off last week in Hokkaido.According to JYP Entertainment on Monday, the ongoing Japanese leg will now include two days of concerts at the Tokyo Dome from March 3-4.It will be the girl group’s second year in a row to perform at one of Japan’s biggest concert venues. The group first performed at the stadium on March 29 and 30 of this year.With the new addition to the itinerary, Twice will perform 27 concerts in 17 cities around the world as a part of the “Twicelights” tour.The girl group is set to launch a new Japanese album, “&TWICE,” on Nov. 20, whose main track, “Fake & True,” was released on Oct. 18 and has topped a Japanese real-time music chart since.Yonhap
